chapters.title: Prologue: Glimmers of the Pattern
chapters.info: King Alsalam Saeed Almadar, p. 17 (3)—King of Arad Doman. He has been a good ruler for over twenty years, though the Council has recently smuggled him out of Bandar Eban—after leaving the city, he seems to have taken on the notion that he is the Rebirth of Artur Hawkwing.
